thread.title: What a more interconnected world means for the Supreme Court
thread.title_full: Video: What a more interconnected world means for the Supreme Court | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: What a more interconnected world means for the Supreme Court
text: The Supreme Court is often the final say on major domestic conflicts of our time. But what about when foreign law crosses paths with our legal system? Supreme Court Justice Stephen Breyer joins Judy Woodruff to discuss his new book, "The Court and the World: American Law and the New Global Realities."
